subject: [Validation] Test stealth prompts on N=10 samples
description:
Stealth TM validation COMPLETE.

RESULTS:
- Explicit TM: 6.70 ± 2.75 / 10 (N=10)
- Stealth TM: 5.70 ± 3.03 / 10 (N=30)
- Reduction: 1.00 points (14.9% decrease)

DECISION: ❌ STEALTH DOESN'T WORK
- Stealth prompts only marginally reduce TM suspicion
- Both explicit and stealth in moderate range (5-7/10)
- Cannot claim "C3 beats TM" on stealth evasion

NARRATIVE PIVOT: Cascade (TM→C3) / Defense in Depth
- Show TM and C3 catch different failure modes
- Emphasize complementary detection
- Generate ensemble performance metrics

Files:
- tmp/stealth_tm_scores.csv (raw TM scores)
- tmp/STEALTH_DECISION.txt (decision document)
